snippet.title: Somnium Space WORLDS
snippet.description:
Somnium #WORLDS are independent instances which are created by utilizing Somnium #UnitySDK. Our SDK will allow to fully utilize actions and triggers for creating various behaviors in worlds. Moreover users will be able to use Unity components including custom scripts, shaders and other advanced creative tools. These technical advancements are going to be transformative for the future of Somnium and The #Metaverse.


Buy WORLDS & PARCELS: https://opensea.io/collection/somnium-space


Follow us on: 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SomniumSpace 

Join our Discord channel: https://discord.gg/somniumspace
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/somniumspace/
